## R Markdown memos  
* To hide code: `{r, echo=FALSE}`
* To hide code, to generate plot files but hide them in the output document: `{r,echo=FALSE,fig.show="hide"}`
* To suppress messages, for instance when loading packages, use `suppressMessages`. E.g. `suppressMessages(library(xgboost))`
